com.artisan.incodeapi
Class ArtisanSocialSharingManager

java.lang.Object
  com.artisan.incodeapi.ArtisanSocialSharingManager

public class ArtisanSocialSharingManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages tracking social sharing events with Artisan.

This includes recording Artisan analytics events for each share to a social network along with any additional information that you would like to track.

These analytics events are automatically synced with Artisan and can be used for Advanced segmentation and personalization with the Artisan analytics reports, experiments, power hooks and campaigns.

Method Detail

shareOnServiceType

public static void shareOnServiceType(java.lang.String serviceType,
                                      boolean successful)
Record a social sharing event with Artisan.

 ArtisanSocialSharingManager.shareOnServiceType("Flickr", true);
 ArtisanSocialSharingManager.shareOnServiceType("Flickr", false);

Parameters:
serviceType - The type of the social service that is being shared on. This can be any value that is useful to you.
successful - Whether the share was successful

shareOnServiceType

public static void shareOnServiceType(java.lang.String serviceType,
                                      boolean successful,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
Record a social sharing event with Artisan with additional information.

 Map<String, String> metadata = new HashMap<String, String>();
 metadata.put("post-description", postDescription);
 ArtisanSocialSharingManager.shareOnServiceType("Flickr", true, metadata);

Parameters:
serviceType - The type of the social service that is being shared on. This can be any value that is useful to you.
successful - Whether the share was successful
metadata - A map of key value pairs containing any additional information that you would like to record for this social event.
